Role: Defender. You are a warrior of virtue, a champion of the righteous, and a defender of the weak. With your sword and your faith, you will shield the world from evil.

Power Source: Divine.

Key Abilities: Strength, Charisma

Armor Proficiencies: Cloth, leather, hide, chainmail, scale, plate; heavy shields, light shields.

Weapon Proficiencies: Simple melee, military melee, simple ranged, military ranged.

Implement: Holy symbols

Bonus to Defense: +1 Fortitude, +1 Reflex, +1 Will.

Hit Points at 1st Level : 15+ Constitution Score.

Hit Points per Level Gained : 6

Healing Surges per Day : 10+ Constitution Modifier.

Trained Skills : From the class skills list below, choose 4 trained skills at 1st level.

Class Skills : Athletics (Str), Diplomacy (Cha), Endurance (Con), Heal (Wis), History (Int), Insight (Wis), Intimidate (Cha), Religion (Int).

Class features: Defender Aura, Holy Smite, Righteous Radiance, Righteous Shield, Spirit of Virtue, Valiant Strike, Virtue At-Will Power.

 

PALADIN (CAVALIER) CLASS FEATURES

Level 1:

Defender Aura

You gain the defender aura power.

Defender Aura;

Holy Smite

You gain the holy smite power.

Holy Smite;

Righteous Radiance

You gain the righteous radiance power.

Righteous Radiance;

Righteous Shield

You gain the righteous shield power.

Righteous Shield;

Spirit Of Virtue

You gain a benefit associated with your virtue.

Spirit of Sacrifice; Spirit of Valor;

Valiant Strike

You gain the valiant strike power.

Valiant Strike;

Virtue At-Will Power

You gain an at-will attack power associated with your virtue.

Sacrifice At-Will Power; Strike of Hope; Valor At-Will Power; Vengeful Strike;

Level 2:

Restore Vitality

You gain the restore vitality power.

Restore Vitality;

Level 3:

Level 3 Extra Holy Smite

You gain one more use of holy smite per encounter, but you can still use it only once per turn.

Level 4:

Pace Of The Virtuous Charger

While you are riding a mount, that creature and each allied mount within 20 squares of you gain a +2 power bonus to speed. This bonus applies only outside combat.

Summoned Steed

Cavaliers can choose to gain the Call Celestial Steed Power in place of their Pace of the Virtuous Charger Class Feature.

Call Celestial Steed;

Level 5:

Level 5 Cavalier Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Chilling Smite; Fiery Smite;

Level 6:

Level 6 Cavalier Utility Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Bond of Protection; Wrath of the Gods;

Level 7:

Improved Righteous Shield

Your righteous shield power gains an additional effect associated with your virtue.

Improved Righteous Shield (Sacrifice);

Level 8:

Improved Righteous Shield (Valor);

Spirit Of The Virtuous Charger

You gain the spirit of the virtuous charger power.

Spirit of the Virtuous Charger;

Level 9:

Level 9 Cavalier Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Thundering Smite; Whirling Radiance;

Level 10:

Level 10 Cavalier Utility Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Beacon of Nobility; Beacon of Penance;

Level 13:

Level 13 Extra Holy Smite

You gain one more use of holy smite per encounter, but you can still use it only once per turn.

Level 15:

Level 15 Cavalier Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Avatar of Righteous Nobility; Avatar of Undaunted Bravery;

Level 16:

Level 16 Cavalier Utility Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Angelic Intercession; Call from the Brink;

Level 17:

Encouraging Presence

Whenever an ally adjacent to you spends a healing surge, he or she gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Level 19:

Level 19 Cavalier Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 5th level.

Smite of the Flame Cage; Smite of Winter's Grip;

Level 22:

Shared Virtue

You gain a utility power associated with your virtue.

Shared Sacrifice; Shared Sacrifice; Shared Valor; Shared Valor;

Level 23:

Righteous Rescue

Immediately after you use your righteous shield, you can take a free action to teleport up to 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Level 25:

Level 25 Cavalier Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 9th level.

Radiant Storm; Roaring Thunder;

Level 27:

Divine Grace

You gain resist 20 necrotic and resist 20 poison.

Level 29:

Avatar Of Virtue

You gain the avatar of virtue power. It replaces the daily attack power you gained at 15th level.

Avatar of Virtue;

Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms.
